solution_line_template: For every {steps_forward_per_cycle} steps forward, he adds {steps_backward_per_cycle} more backwards so each 'step' gained costs {steps_per_net_step} actual steps
{distance_to_mailbox} steps distance * {steps_per_net_step} steps moved = <<{distance_to_mailbox}*{steps_per_net_step}={total_steps}>>{total_steps} steps total
